amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 116-51 to request a GAO report on the impacts to mental health care and treatment, and how many individuals would lose care, if the waivers for State innovation are awarded.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Harder (CA) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Harder (CA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Harder (CA) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
